project.teaser: Aim of the project is to become a true one-stop-shop for business and innovation support along the entire value chain, providing its services in the proposed region the context of HORIZON 2020 Programme and in line with the Europe 2020 strategy. innovation support services...
project.objective: Aim of the project is to become a true one-stop-shop for business and innovation support along the entire value chain, providing its services in the proposed region the context of HORIZON 2020 Programme and in line with the Europe 2020 strategy. innovation support services will help strengthen the competitiveness and sustainability of regional enterprises. Proposed project will include two acitivity type which are “Key account management under the SME Instrument of Horizon 2020” and “Services to enhance the innovation management capacities of SMEs”

result.title: Atlas of initial conditions & model evaluation
result.description: Atlas containing maps documenting the initial conditions of the selected models, and documenting responses of the models to CSF management. Maps will include a comparison of the selected models with one another, and with observation-based products. The independent datasets will come from WP3, WP4, and WP5. The atlas will contain maps of bulk density, pH, litter depth, soil C content, soil C/N ratios, tree diameter, tree height, stand density, maps of litter input, soil respiration, basal area, standing biomass, and wood harvest.

result.title: Soil sampling design, monitoring & measurement protocols
result.description: Field guides for soil sampling, measurement protocols for GHG reporting, and a guideline for error calculation of GHG reporting, which. These guidelines will be used for training courses, new monitoring systems, and GHG reporting. They will focus on time and space scale monitoring for different aims, large monitoring for upscaling, and intensive monitoring for a better process understanding.

result.title: New equations to describe allocation of C from GPP into mycorrhizae & its effect on decomposition
